workzy.core.workspace¶

class workzy.core.workspace.Workspace(name)¶

Workspace organize different types of process (jobs) to run simultaneuosly. Each job it is a Thread that runs when the user call the workspace’s name.

Parameters

name (str.) – A name for this workspace that will call by the user.

append(command)¶

Add a new command for jobs attributes.

Parameters

command (str.) – new command to be added.

Return type

None

date()¶

Getter method that returns a date.

initialize()¶

Calls the thread’s start method and invokes the process’s run method.

-Needs a counter

Return type

None

property jobs¶

Getter method that returns all jobs associated with this Workspace.

Returns

A list that refers a process associated with this Workspace.

Return type

class: list.

property minutes¶

Getter method that minutes worked.

property name¶

Getter method that returns the name of the Workspace.

Returns

The name of the Workspace.

Return type

str.

remove(command)¶

Remove a workspace command.

Parameters

command (str.) – command to be removed.

Return type

None
